View.Label: Equipment Required:
A) Differential Pressure Gage--Minimum range 0 - 15PSID (0.1 or 0.2 psid graduations)
B) Three 6ft. lengths - minimum 1/4"(/) high presure hose
C) 1/4" Needle valves, for fine control of flows
D) Three 1/4" IPS x 45deg SAE flare connectors--brass
E)Adapter fittings for eaach test cock size -- brass 1/8" x 1/4", 1/4" x 1/2", 1/4" x 3/4"
